headline: HAS LAWSUIT ALERT: The Gross Law Firm Notifies Hasbro, Inc. Investors of a Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadline
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Gross Law Firm issues the following notice to shareholders of Hasbro, Inc. . ...
